rows.label: qev055801_MSG0001
rows.name:
Surviving on this planet as an Orphean is difficult.
All the more so for an individual who lacks any
particular technological expertise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0002
rows.name:
Which brings me to a question—have you ever seen
the Prone control wild beasts?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_JNK0010
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev055801_SEL0011
rows.name: Say that you have.

rows.label: qev055801_JNK0020
rows.name: Deny

rows.label: qev055801_SEL0021
rows.name: Say you haven't had the pleasure.

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0003
rows.name:
Then I am glad to have found an expert!
Please describe to me what you saw.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0004
rows.name:
Hmm... Mmm-hmm, yes. Yes, I see.
That all conforms to my own research.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0005
rows.name: This may actually work...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0006
rows.name:
I have succeeded in synthesizing a copy of the incense
they use when taking command of beasts, you see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0007
rows.name: I see. I also have not witnessed it firsthand.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0008
rows.name:
But after a series of investigations, I have succeeded in
synthesizing the incense they use when taking command
of beasts.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0009
rows.name:
Though I sadly cannot rival their powerful physiques,
mastering their beast-taming techniques should improve
my survivability considerably.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0010
rows.name: I plan to begin trials shortly. Might I ask your help?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0011
rows.name:
Thank you. These experiments will be dangerous—
quite possibly lethal, should something go wrong—
and I do not have the nerve to perform them alone.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0012
rows.name:
Let us head to the Shadow Beach, where I will use this
incense to tame a grand lophid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0013
rows.name: Ah, look! There is a grand lophid now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0014
rows.name:
I will attempt to tame it. If the incense yields no effect,
please intercede immediately. Will you do this?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_JNK0030
rows.name: Confirm

rows.label: qev055801_SEL0031
rows.name: Tell Min'barac that he has nothing to worry about.

rows.label: qev055801_JNK0040
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev055801_SEL0041
rows.name:
Express concern that it might eat
Min'barac before you can react.

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0015
rows.name:
I suppose a beast of that size is no threat to one of
your ability.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0016
rows.name:
If I am honest, I envy you—you possess the strength to
defend yourself without resorting to risky tactics such as
I must.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0017
rows.name:
I am aware the chances of this experiment succeeding
are slim, but fear I am incapable of surviving on Mira
otherwise.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0018
rows.name: Framed in that context, it is a gamble worth taking.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0019
rows.name:
I will begin the test now. ...Heh. Despite the dire
circumstances, my Ovah is exhilarated.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0020
rows.name:
If I succeed in making a beast like that my servant,
it would fill me with quite a sense of accomplishment.
Almost as if I showed it up somehow.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0021
rows.name:
I WILL master it. I refuse to be underestimated by a
beast like that again.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0022
rows.name:
It...it is working! ...Good beast. Closer now.
Nice and slow...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0023
rows.name:
Ah, you are back.
I have finished gathering information.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0024
rows.name:
I must admit, I never thought the Prone and other races
would be so kind and approachable.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_JNK0050
rows.name: Nod

rows.label: qev055801_SEL0051
rows.name: Agree that there are very few bad seeds in NLA.

rows.label: qev055801_JNK0060
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev055801_SEL0061
rows.name: Ask who Min'barac made friends with.

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0025
rows.name:
Truly a fine bunch—yourself included. I did encounter
some cultural differences, but they were well within
tolerances.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0026
rows.name:
I spoke with a Prone called Selia, a Ma-non named
Noborata, and the Nopon Tikotiko.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0027
rows.name:
Apparently they all frequently gather information here.
They were most knowledgeable, and I found our
conversations to be quite illuminating.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0028
rows.name: You there. You saved Min'barac's life?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0029
rows.name:
That Orphean is mad. Prone would never attempt
such risky taming.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0030
rows.name:
But it should be possible, so long as I produce the
incense just as you taught me, Selia.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0031
rows.name:
The Prone recipe calls for an amidresian tomato,
three jagged mortars, and two units of meditation
powder.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0032
rows.name:
I hate to ask, but could you procure them for me?
I would like to remain here to review the taming
procedure a few more times.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0033
rows.name:
The more I learn of this Prone rite, the deeper it seems.
I was naive to think that simply gathering information
on it would make me a master.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0034
rows.name:
But master it I will, and that will be the day I acquire
the strength to survive. For now, I entrust you with
gathering the ingredients.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0035
rows.name:
If they prove elusive, I suggest you ask my
knowledgeable associates here.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0036
rows.name:
Preparations are complete here,
[ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0037
rows.name:
And what about you?
Have you secured the ingredients for the incense?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0038
rows.name:
Thank you.
...Does this look right, Selia?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0039
rows.name:
Yes. You can make servant of anything with that.
Even belgazus or valdileo will bend knee![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0040
rows.name:
Then I am off to the shore.
Thank you all for your generous help.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0041
rows.name:
Tell us if you have trouble. Everyone here is lazy bum.
Too busy sitting to work or fight.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0042
rows.name:
We must help when we can.
Otherwise Old Ones will smite us all! Ha ha![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0043
rows.name:
Strange. She does not possess an Ovah, yet I feel a
great warmth in her words. How is that possible?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_JNK0070
rows.name: Explain

rows.label: qev055801_SEL0071
rows.name:
Say that good intentions are
all you need to form a bond.

rows.label: qev055801_JNK0080
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev055801_SEL0081
rows.name: Ask if the Ovah is really such a central thing.

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0044
rows.name:
I see. I have always been mystified by that aspect of
the interpersonal relationships of other races.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0045
rows.name:
But lately, I have come to place my trust in bonds
made apart from the Ovah as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0046
rows.name: It is absolute—our sole guiding truth.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0047
rows.name:
...Yet I am beginning to see the possibility of other
sorts of bonds between individuals as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0048
rows.name:
I will meet you on the Shadow Beach once more,
[ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0049
rows.name: After all her help, I owe it to Selia to succeed this time.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0050
rows.name: We are fortunate that another grand lophid is there.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0051
rows.name:
We seem to have caught it off guard...
Now is our chance![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_JNK0090
rows.name: Cheer

rows.label: qev055801_SEL0091
rows.name: Urge the enthusiastic Min'barac on.

rows.label: qev055801_JNK0100
rows.name: Worry

rows.label: qev055801_SEL0101
rows.name: Express concern that Min'barac will be eaten after all.

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0052
rows.name:
Hearing those words from someone such as you fills me
with courage.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0053
rows.name:
This time I am armed with Selia's special incense.
I will not fail to make the beast mine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0054
rows.name: You are as kind as ever, just like the others I met.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0055
rows.name:
But you need not worry—I have Selia's incense this
time, and will not fail to make the beast mine![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0056
rows.name:
Match my breathing to its own... Meet its eyes...
Take hold of the beast's spirit![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0057
rows.name: It's just as Selia said! This creature is now my servant.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055801_MSG0058
rows.name: Slowly, now... Easy... And come to me![ST:wait ]
